page.title: 073 Farms,Bromley,S.E.
page.content: The Green Street Green area has three farms.One of them grows only crops:- cereals and vegetables and some fruit. The other two are mainly grassland.One has recently changed from dairy farming to beef cattle,sheep and some cereals,because of the E.E.C. restrictions.The farmland shows various features which often occur on the Urban Fringe.Some of the original farm land has been taken for more recreational uses.Land is used for pick-your-own fruit and a few fields are used for horses.Some farmers would like to sell fields close to existing houses for building,while others would like to buy back farmland already sold under compulsory purchase orders.
